ERVIN AND ASSOCIATES, INCORPORATED, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 04-5082. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Jan. 18, 2005.

Before LOURIE, SCHALL, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

*948ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
